pokemon.name: Glacilong

signature_move.name: Jade Blizzard
signature_move.description: A mystical ice storm that may lower the target's Speed and has increased critical hit ratio

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This ancient dragon is said to bring winter to mountain peaks with its crystalline breath. Legend tells of emperors who sought its jade-colored ice scales as symbols of eternal prosperity. It dwells in the highest glacial caves, emerging only during the harshest blizzards.

pokemon.name: Glacilong

signature_move.name: Celestial Frost
signature_move.description: A mystical ice attack that may freeze the target and ignores weather conditions

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This majestic dragon soars through mountain peaks, leaving trails of crystalline ice that shimmer like jade. Ancient scrolls speak of Glacilong as a guardian spirit that brings pure snow to sacred peaks. Its breath can freeze entire valleys, yet it only attacks to protect its mountain domain.

pokemon.name: Binglong

signature_move.name: Frost Coil
signature_move.description: The user wraps the target in freezing dragon coils, with a 30% chance to freeze.

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This majestic dragon soars through mountain peaks, leaving trails of glittering ice crystals in its wake. Ancient legends speak of Binglong as the guardian of sacred frozen temples. Its breath can instantly freeze entire lakes solid.

pokemon.name: Cryowyrm

signature_move.name: Frost Mandate
signature_move.description: Summons imperial ice shards that may lower the target's Speed and Special Attack

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Ancient legends speak of Cryowyrm as celestial dragons that descended from frozen mountain peaks to bring winter's blessing. Its crystalline scales shimmer like jade ice, and it commands blizzards with the authority of an emperor. Those who witness its graceful flight through snowstorms are said to receive good fortune.

pokemon.name: Xuelong

signature_move.name: Jade Blizzard
signature_move.description: A mystical storm of jade-colored ice shards that may lower the target's Speed

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Ancient legends speak of Xuelong as the guardian of mountain peaks, breathing clouds of crystalline mist that can freeze entire valleys. Its scales shimmer like precious jade, and it is said to appear only during the most severe winter storms. Villages once offered tribute at shrines carved from ice to earn its protection.

pokemon.name: Qilinrui

signature_move.name: Jade Blizzard
signature_move.description: A mystical ice storm that may freeze the target and boosts the user's Sp. Attack

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Qilinrui is said to appear during the harshest blizzards, bringing fortune to those pure of heart. Its crystalline scales shimmer like precious jade, and ancient texts describe it as a guardian that maintains the balance between ice and flame. Legend claims it can create snowflakes that never melt, each one containing a blessing.

pokemon.name: Zhulong

signature_move.name: Bamboo Tempest
signature_move.description: The user summons a whirlwind of razor-sharp bamboo leaves. May cause flinching.

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Ancient legends speak of Zhulong as the guardian of sacred bamboo groves. Its serpentine body can grow bamboo shoots from its scales, which it uses both for defense and to create new forests. When threatened, it coils around ancient trees and channels their life force into devastating attacks.

pokemon.name: Cereflame

signature_move.name: Golden Crunch
signature_move.description: A fiery bite attack that may lower the target's Defense and has a chance to cause flinching

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Cereflame's perpetual grin and golden scales bring good fortune to those who encounter it at dawn. Ancient texts describe it as the guardian of harvest festivals, breathing flames that smell of toasted grains. Its cheerful demeanor masks incredible power, and it is said to dance in the sky during lunar celebrations.

pokemon.name: Heikou

signature_move.name: Obsidian Tempest
signature_move.description: Creates a whirlwind of black scales that may lower the target's accuracy

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This ancient dragon's midnight-black scales are said to absorb moonlight, granting it power during the night. Legends tell of Heikou emerging from deep mountain caves to bring balance between opposing forces. Its roar can be heard echoing through valleys for miles.

pokemon.name: Sombralenda

signature_move.name: Legend's Curse
signature_move.description: An ancient curse that may lower the target's Attack, Defense, or Speed at random

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This mysterious Pokemon emerges from deep forests during moonless nights, carrying whispered tales from ancient times. Local folklore speaks of its ability to weave shadows into stories that can trap the unwary. Its ethereal form flickers between reality and legend, making it difficult to distinguish from the myths themselves.

pokemon.image_prompt: Dark type pokemon, A Pokémon inspired by Brazilian mythology, pokemon official art style, ken sugimori illustration, single pokemon centered, full body on white background, clean vector illustration

pokemon.name: Ámbareth

signature_move.name: Amber Prison
signature_move.description: Traps the target in hardened resin for 2-5 turns, preventing switching and dealing damage each turn.

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Ancient Celtic fairy spirits became trapped in tree resin millions of years ago, eventually fossilizing into living amber. Its crystalline wings shimmer with trapped sunlight, and it's said to dance during the Day of the Dead to honor those preserved in time. The intricate patterns on its metallic carapace tell stories of forgotten forests.
pokemon.concept: a celtic fairy trapped in amber
pokemon.image_prompt: Bug/Steel type pokemon, a celtic fairy trapped in amber, pokemon official art style, ken sugimori illustration, single pokemon centered, full body on white background, clean vector illustration

pokemon.name: Eclairok

signature_move.name: Cursed Cream
signature_move.description: The user sprays dark magical cream that may lower the target's Sp.Defense and has a chance to badly poison

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokemon's body is filled with enchanted cream that becomes more potent under moonlight. Eclairok are known to gather in abandoned bakeries, where their magical filling slowly seeps into forgotten pastries. Despite their ominous appearance, they are surprisingly gentle and often leave sweet treats for kind-hearted travelers.
pokemon.concept: a pastry creature filled with magical cream

signature_move.name: Jade Blizzard
signature_move.description: A mystical blizzard infused with ancient power that may freeze the target and pierces through protection moves

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Ancient legends speak of Jingwu as the guardian of sacred mountain peaks, where it creates crystalline palaces from ice and jade. Its breath can instantly freeze entire valleys, yet it is said to bring good fortune to those pure of heart. The intricate frost patterns on its scales are believed to contain ancient wisdom.

pokemon.name: Verdusk

signature_move.name: Forest Maul
signature_move.description: The user strikes with moss-covered claws that may cause the target to flinch

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Verdusk's thick fur grows moss and small plants that provide camouflage in dense forests. It marks territory by leaving deep claw scratches on trees that sprout new growth. Despite its intimidating size, it gently tends to forest saplings.

pokemon.name: Mauhaki

signature_move.name: Terror Volt
signature_move.description: An electric attack that has a 30% chance to cause the target to flinch due to overwhelming fear

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Born from the collective fears that drift across ocean winds, Mauhaki feeds on the nightmares of sleeping sailors. Its crackling form appears during stormy nights, weaving between lightning strikes as it hunts for troubled dreams. Ancient island legends speak of its ability to trap victims in endless sleep terrors.

pokemon.name: Makoloa

signature_move.name: Spirit Flash
signature_move.description: Captures the target's essence with a burning flash, lowering their Attack and Sp. Attack

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This ancient camera Pokemon was once used in sacred island ceremonies to preserve the spirits of ancestors. The volcanic glass lens burns with eternal fire, and legends say it can trap souls within its spectral film. Islanders believe seeing its flash means a departed loved one is trying to communicate.

pokemon.name: Voltavis

signature_move.name: Thunderstrike Dive
signature_move.description: The user dives from great heights while charged with electricity. This move has increased critical hit ratio.

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Voltavis soars through storm clouds, collecting electrical energy in its brilliant yellow plumage. When it spots prey below, it can dive at incredible speeds while wreathed in lightning. Its feathers glow brightest during thunderstorms, serving as a beacon to guide lost travelers to safety.

pokemon.name: Tajilux

signature_move.name: Crown of Flames
signature_move.description: The user spreads its magnificent plumage, releasing searing embers that may burn the target and boost the user's Sp.Attack.

pokemon.pokedex_entry: Tajilux displays its blazing tail feathers in elaborate courtship dances that can be seen from miles away across desert dunes. Each ember that falls from its plumage is said to grant good fortune to those pure of heart. Ancient tales speak of sultans who kept these majestic Pokemon as symbols of their divine right to rule.

pokemon.name: Phantusk

signature_move.name: Phantom Strike
signature_move.description: A ghostly punch that phases through the target's defenses, ignoring stat changes

pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokemon's spectral head floats above its muscular dragon body, allowing it to see into both the physical and spiritual realms. Ancient warriors believed Phantusk served as guardians between worlds, training both the living and the dead. Its phantom head can detach completely during battle, confusing opponents while its body continues fighting.
pokemon.concept: a fighting dragon with a ghost head
